name: Perceval, the Seeker of Holy Grail
text:
When this card enters your field, reveal the top five cards of your main deck. You may put a Regalia or Knight of the Round Table from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your main deck in any order.
Banish this card: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target J-ruler or Knight of the Round Table until end of turn.
